price: 56. Diggah Yallaa kee kay Malayka Yallih farmoytal salat oobisan (salat Yallak saaree kee nacruuruuy, kay malaykak dooqáa kee dambi cabti Yallal kaah essertaama) kee nummayse maraw racmat kee nagaynan maggom kaal oobisa.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ وَمَلَٰٓئِكَتَهُۥ يُصَلُّونَ عَلَى ٱلنَّبِيِّۚ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ صَلُّواْ عَلَيۡهِ وَسَلِّمُواْ تَسۡلِيمًا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha wamalāikatahu yuṣallūna ʿalā al-nabiyi yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ṣallū ʿalayhi wasallimū taslīman
